Quanta.Views package¶

Submodules¶

Quanta.Views.Bin module¶

Quanta.Bin is a view that can hold only one child. The child can be either another view or Quanta.Element.

class Quanta.Views.Bin.Bin(**kwargs)¶

Bases: gi.repository.Gtk.Bin

add_child(child)¶

Adds the child self.

Parameters

child (Quanta.View heir or Quanta.Element) – The child to be added to self.

Raises

ValueError – Raised when self already has a child.

get_props()¶

Gets the interface properties.

Returns

A dictionary with interface properties.

Return type

dict

remove_child(child)¶

Removes the given child from self.

Parameters

child (Quanta.View heir or Quanta.Element) – The child which has to be removed from self.

Raises

ValueError – Raised when child is not present in self.

replace_child(old_child, new_child)¶

Replaces the existing child with a new child.

Parameters

  • old_child (Quanta.View heir or Quanta.Element) – The child present in self which has to be replaced.

  • new_child (Quanta.View heir or Quanta.Element) – The child that will replace the given old_child of self.

Sets the interface from given properties.

Parameters

props (dict) – The dictionary containig properties of interface.

Quanta.Views.Notebook module¶

Quanta.Notebook is a view that can hold only children of type Quanta.Element. With this restriction, there is no limitation in number of children it can hold.

class Quanta.Views.Notebook.Notebook(**kwargs)¶

Bases: gi.repository.Gtk.Notebook

ACTION_BUTTON_ERROR = 'Expected {} action button{} for Notebook as per given properties, but got {}'¶
INVALID_CHILD = 'Quanta Notebook can only hold a child of type Quanta Element'¶
add_child(child, position=-1)¶

Adds the child self.

Parameters

child (Quanta.Element) – The child to be added to self.

Raises

TypeError – Raised when child is not of type Quanta.Element.

change_child_label(child)¶

Changes the label for existing child.

Parameters

child (Quanta.Element) – The child whose label has to be changed.

Note

The text for new label is taken as the name of child of child (Quanta.Element.child_name). It is set to “No child” when child has no name for its child (Quanta.Element.child_name is None).

get_action_button(pack_type)¶

Gets the action button at given position.

Parameters

pack_type (Gtk.PackType) – The position from which action button has to retrieved.

Returns

Return type

Gtk.Button or None if self has no action button.

get_number_of_action_buttons()¶

Gets the number of action buttons present.

Returns

The number of action buttons.

Return type

int

get_props()¶

Gets the interface properties.

Returns

A dictionary with interface properties.

Return type

dict

get_tab(child)¶

Gets a tab label for child.

Parameters

child (Quanta.Element) – The child which requires a tab label.

Returns

Return type

Gtk.Label with text determined from child.

Note

The text for new label is taken as the name of child of child (Quanta.Element.child_name). It is set to “No child” when child has no name for its child (Quanta.Element.child_name is None). Based on position of tabs in self, the orientation of text in the label also varies.

remove_child(child)¶

Removes the given child from self.

Parameters

child (Quanta.Element) – The child which has to be removed from self.

Raises

ValueError – Raised when child is not present in self.

replace_child(old_child, new_child)¶

Replaces the existing child with a new child.

Parameters

  • old_child (Quanta.Element) – The child present in self which has to be replaced.

  • new_child (Quanta.View heir or Quanta.Element) – The child that will replace the given existing child of self.

Raises

TypeError – Raised when new_child is not a Quanta.Element.

set_action_button(icon, pack_type)¶

Sets the action button.

Parameters

  • icon (Gtk.Image) – The icon to be placed in action button.

  • pack_type (Gtk.PackType) – The position of the action button.

set_from_props(props)¶

Sets the interface from given properties.

Parameters

props (dict) – The dictionary containig properties of interface.

Raises

ValueError – Raised when there is a mismatch of number of action buttons in properties and self.

Quanta.Views.Paned module¶

Quanta.Paned is a view that can hold two children. The two children can either be views or Quanta.Element.

class Quanta.Views.Paned.Paned(**kwargs)¶

Bases: gi.overrides.Gtk.Paned

add_child(child, position=0)¶

Adds the child self.

Parameters

  • child (Quanta.View heir or Quanta.Element) – The child to be added to self.

  • position (int) – The panel at which the child has to be added. position can be 0 or 1 or 2, with default value being 0.

Raises

ValueError – Raised when self already has a child.

Note

When position is 1 or 2, child is added at panel 1 or 2 of self respectively. When it is 0, child is added to the first available panel. When it is neither of specified values, nothing is done.

get_props()¶

Gets the interface properties.

Returns

A dictionary with interface properties.

Return type

dict

remove_child(child)¶

Removes the given child from self.

Parameters

child (Quanta.View heir or Quanta.Element) – The child which has to be removed from self.

Raises

ValueError – Raised when child is not present in self.

replace_child(old_child, new_child)¶

Replaces the existing child with a new child.

Parameters

  • old_child (Quanta.View heir or Quanta.Element) – The child present in self which has to be replaced.

  • new_child (Quanta.View heir or Quanta.Element) – The child that will replace the given existing child of self.

Raises

ValueError – Raised when old_child is not in self.

set_from_props(props)¶

Sets the interface from given properties.

Parameters

props (dict) – The dictionary containig properties of interface.

Quanta.Views.View module¶

A Quanta,View heir can hold children of type Quanta.Element. In some case, there is a restriction on number of children it can hold. Quanta.View is a template class, that gives idea of essential methods any valid Quanta.View heir must have.

class Quanta.Views.View.View(**kwargs)¶

Bases: object

CHILD_NOT_PRESENT_ERROR = 'Child to be replaced is not in Quanta {}'¶
INSUFFICIENT_INFO_ERROR = 'Insufficient information to add child to Quanta {}'¶
OVERFLOW_ERROR = 'Quanta {} can not have any more child'¶
add_child(child)¶

Adds the child self.

Parameters

child (Quanta.View heir or Quanta.Element) – The child to be added to self.

Raises

  • ValueError – Raised with error message of type INSUFFICIENT_INFO_ERROR when more information is required to place child in self.

  • ValueError – Raised with error message of type OVERFLOW_ERROR when self cannot have any more child.

Note

When there is a lack of information to add the child, self may try its best to add child in suitable position.

get_props()¶

Gets the interface properties.

Returns

A dictionary with interface properties.

Return type

dict

remove_child(child)¶

Removes the given child.

Parameters

child (Quanta.View heir or Quanta.Element) – The child which has to be removed from self.

Raises

ValueError – Raises when child is not present in self.

replace_child(old_child, new_child)¶

Replaces the existing child with new child.

Parameters

  • old_child (Quanta.View heir or Quanta.Element) – The child present in self which has to be replaced.

  • new_child (Quanta.View heir or Quanta.Element) – The child that will replace the given old_child of self.
